document_data.name: ''Bonny''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bonny''''' was a piece of enchanted fabric from [[Waterdeep]] that was folded into a makeshift bandana in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Bonny'' was a navy-blue piece of cloth with a light-blue shape on its middle.
document_data.Powers: ''Bonny'' allowed the wearer to cast a burst of powerful ''healing'' magic onto an ally.
document_data.History: At some point in the late 15{{th}} century DR, Calliope found herself preparing to raid a midnight ball somewhere in Waterdeep's [[Sea Ward]]. The bard knew that she would either need a mask or a good bandage and sliced a piece of [[Mirt]] the Moneylender's coat for that very purpose. Little did she know that the coat and the fabric she took from the unsuspecting Old Wolf was imbued with powerful restorative enchantments.
